content.question: In the fifth sentence of the fourth paragraph (“And in certain...true”), the author italicizes the verb “is” primarily to emphasize

choices.label: an area of agreement between himself and another author whose views he has challenged
an area of disagreement between himself and another author whose views he generally agrees with
the equivalence he sees between two seemingly different claims
the equivalence he sees between two seemingly different terms

content.answer: an area of agreement between himself and another author whose views he has challenged

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
